alert.note: Alert for East Central Plains; North Central Mountains; Northeast Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 18 at 5:23AM MDT until May 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT THURSDAY FOR MUCH OF NORTHERN, WESTERN, AND EASTERN NM DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, NEAR- RECORD HEAT, AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FRIDAY FOR ALL AREAS EXCEPT THE NORTHEAST PLAINS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, NEAR-RECORD HEAT, AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... .Strong west to southwest winds with single digit humidity, near record hot temperatures, and an unstable airmass will generate widespread critical fire weather conditions Thursday and Friday. The strongest winds are likely to occur along and north of the I- 40 corridor both days. Poor overnight humidity recoveries with breezy to windy conditions Thursday night will keep elevated critical conditions going all night in many areas. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT THURSDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a Red Flag Warning...which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Thursday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AREA AND TIMING...Northwest Plateau, North Central Mountains, Northeast Highlands, Northwest Highlands, Sandia, Manzano, and Gallinas Mountains, and the East Central Plains Thursday and Friday. * 20 FOOT WINDS...West-southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 mph Thursday and Friday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...4 to 8 percent Thursday. 6 to 12 percent Friday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: East Central Plains; North Central Mountains; Northeast Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains
